thread.title: Man charged with inappropriately touching Aurora haunted house actress Aurora Beacon-News
thread.title_full: Man charged with inappropriately touching Aurora haunted house actress - Aurora Beacon-News

author: Erika Wurst
title: Man charged with inappropriately touching Aurora haunted house actress Aurora Beacon-News
text:
A 20-year-old man was arrested Thursday evening at an Aurora haunted house after he allegedly touched one of the female character actors in an inappropriate way, Aurora police said.
Quassas Diab, of Hickory Hills, was a guest at The Basement of the Dead, in the first block of West New York Street, around 8:49 p.m. when he is charged with touching a 19-year-old employee "near her buttocks," Aurora Police Department spokesman Dan Ferrelli said.
According to Ferrelli, cellphone video footage taken of the incident shows Diab taking "large strides" toward the woman and touching her on her back while she was looking away from him.
Diab was charged with misdemeanor disorderly conduct.
Ferrelli said the female employee was not injured.
